data.text: @TriashaDas6 I mean the best korea example i can give is that some guy came into a convenience store in gangnam with no mask and the customers all started heckling him, the cashier told him he couldnt buy anything and some older guy yelled 'idiots like you are the reason covid wont end!!'
@peachchuu Meanwhile some Indians are trying to ignore masks as of masks are their exes!! 😭
@kai_croptop Saw a lady in my neighborhood wearing a face shield, legit science goggles, plastic gloves and a n95 mask ... mood
@peachchuu Meanwhile Americans are just like “mask? What mask?” I tell you. What a world. :(
To be fair I have given up on the outside world and will be using gmarket from my cave until the cases aren't in 200,000 per day?!
